price: 205. Ku xusna Rabbigaa naftaada si khushuuc iyo cabsi leh adigoon kor ugula tanaagooneyn codka aroor iyo galabba,  hana ka mid noqon kuwa dhoohan.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ فِي نَفۡسِكَ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخِيفَةٗ وَدُونَ ٱلۡجَهۡرِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡغَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur rabbaka fī nafsika taḍarruʿan wakhīfatan wadūna al-jahri mina al-qawli bil-ghuduwi wal-āṣāli walā takun mina al-ghāfilīna
